name: The Heads
description:
The heads… ever since the heads appeared, it's never been the same. 

We need this supply run to go right. Without it, our colony won't last. 

Pick up everything you can, then make your way to the helicopter for extraction. 

And uh, you know, avoid being seen.

A horror/stealth/roguelite game made within 72 hours for Ludum Dare 46. 

Use WASD to move, Mouse to look, and Left mouse click or E to interact with things.
